summary: Adds a mine to Breezehome with all the ores.
descriptionHtml:
A small mine with one of each ore type under Breezehome. This is for miners that want a small supply of ore in your home. The door to the mine is right in front of the alchemy table. Inside are also two mining pickaxes.

For more mining use Indefinite Mining by TheONLYPantha. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9215) This makes for more realistic mining in my opinion and to be able to use this little mine for all your crafting needs.

Pictures were taken with Glowing Ore Veins 300 by ByblosHex (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=193) active. Use this mod to see the ore veins better.

v1.1 changes:
- Put in missing pickaxes.
author: NovaCameron
